subject: Economy
question_en: What does the term 'National Income' represent?
question_hi: राष्ट्रीय आय क्या स्वतंत्र आय के विभाग है।
A_hi: ग्रोस दायरे देश के प्रतिकूल आय का एक विभाग है।
explanation_en: National Income refers to the total value of goods and services produced within a country during a specific time period, while Gross Domestic Product (GDP) is the total value of goods and services produced within a country, excluding services from the rest of the world. GDP represents the overall economic activity of a country, including both public and private sectors.
explanation_hi: राष्ट्रीय आय को एक शीर्षितनार के प्रतिक्रुत्रा संकेतों
